entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is scared and trying to avoid being involved in the situation. ("Miss will please keep Dobby out of this")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is seen as mad and dangerous by the house-elves. ("They were suddenly looking at Hermione as though she were mad and dangerous.")

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a house-elf who is standing next to Dobby near the hearth. ("Dobby called miserably from the hearth, where he was standing next to the lumpy tablecloth that was Winky.")

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is receiving food from the house-elves. ("We has your extra food!")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is angry with Hermione for speaking out of turn. ("You couldn’t keep your mouth shut, could you, Hermione?")

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is mentioned as the subject of Winky's knowledge. ("We could’ve tried to get more stuff out of Winky about Crouch!")

relationships.description: The house-elves are looking at Hermione as though she were mad and dangerous. ("They were suddenly looking at Hermione as though she were mad and dangerous.")
Dobby is standing next to Winky near the hearth. ("Dobby called miserably from the hearth, where he was standing next to the lumpy tablecloth that was Winky.")
Ron is angry with Hermione for speaking out of turn. ("You couldn’t keep your mouth shut, could you, Hermione?")
